newsitem.title: USA: PIA expects continued revenue growth.
newsitem.headline: PIA expects continued revenue growth.

text.p: PIA Merchandising Services Inc chief executive Clinton Owens said he expects continued year to year revenue and income growth, as long as present trends continue.
PIA's third quarter net income rose to $1.3 million from $953,000 a year earlier.

"Our customer base of large retailers and manufacturers continues to grow, although shifts in demand from our largest customers can have an important effect on the results of any given quarter, as can the consummation or not of major new client wins," Owens said.
He added that he believes excellent long-term prospects remain unchanged.
